TopicTitle: J-90 Goliath Engine Fans not animated.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel i9-13900KF | GPU: MSI Geforce RTX 3080 | RAM: 32GB

 

Just as the title says the J-90 Goliath fans to not spin when the engine is turned on, they remain static causing the engines to look off.
